articles.title: Wolves mock Arsenal's Granit Xhaka in TikTok video showing him defending against Adama Traore - Daily Mail
articles.description: The West Midlands club have taken to the video-sharing site with a short clip showing Xhaka backpedalling at the Emirates while speedster Traore hurtled towards him with the ball.
articles.content:
Wolves have mocked Granit Xhaka's attempts to defend against Adama Traore during their win at Arsenal last weekend.
